feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas consistently to separate clauses and provide additional information.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 uses more formal language due to its context related to subreddit rules, while Text 2 is more casual and conversational in tone. Some differences in lexical variation and word choice can be observed.

feature3.explanation: Both texts contain relatively simple sentence structures with clear coherence. Text 2 has slightly longer sentences than Text 1. Both texts have a similar word length distribution.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 has a more formal tone related to rules and guidelines, while Text 2 is more informal and conversational. Text 2 includes personal opinions and observations, which differ from the informational nature of Text 1.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in tone and formality level, as well as some variations in word choice and sentence structure, there are notable distinctions that suggest the texts may not have been written by the same author.
